faqs.question: Which Lagavulin expressions do you buy?
faqs.answer: We buy Lagavulin 16 Year, 12 Year Cask Strength, Distillers Edition, anniversary releases, and other limited editions. Availability of standard releases affects whether we can offer on them.

faqs.question: Is Lagavulin 12 Cask Strength collectible?
faqs.answer: Yes. The annual 12 Year Cask Strength release is a Special Release that varies in character each year and is sought after by collectors.

faqs.question: Do older Lagavulin 16 bottles have value?
faqs.answer: Older Lagavulin 16 Year bottles with vintage labels and packaging can be collectible. Send photos and we will evaluate.

faqs.question: What is the Distillers Edition?
faqs.answer: Lagavulin Distillers Edition features sherry cask finishing. Different years have different vintage dates and finish styles.

faqs.question: Does the box add value?
faqs.answer: Yes. Original boxes add value, especially for special releases and older bottlings.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive an offer?
faqs.answer: We typically respond within one business day for Lagavulin submissions.

faqs.question: What was the 200th Anniversary release?
faqs.answer: The Lagavulin 8 Year was released for the distillery's 200th anniversary in 2016 and has become a regular expression. Anniversary editions may have collectible value.

faqs.question: Do you buy Diageo Special Releases?
faqs.answer: Yes. Lagavulin releases within the annual Diageo Special Releases program are collectible. Send photos of any special release bottles.
